description: Take bacon and egg rolls to the next level with these luxurious brioche breakfast burgers. They’re easy to make and are sure to make anyone’s morning extra special.
keywords: Burger,High protein,Seafood free,Spring,Low sugar,Sesame free,Father's Day
name: Brioche Breakfast Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook bacon, in 2 batches, for 4 minutes on each side or until golden. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain. Cut each rasher crossways into thirds.
Reduce heat to medium, then cook eggs, in 2 batches, for 3 minutes or until whites are set and yolks are still soft.
Spread bun bases with aioli, then top each with rocket, bacon and an egg. Drizzle with a little tomato sauce and season. Sandwich with bun tops and serve with remaining tomato sauce.
